title: Lesson 6: Parenting: Discipling Kids
description: Life Skill: Being the primary spiritual influencer of your children.

blocks.text: Discipling children isn't just the job of the church; it starts in the home. It means modeling dependency on God, repenting when we fail, and having natural conversations about faith throughout the day.

And these words that I command you today shall be on your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, and when you walk by the way, and when you lie down, and when you rise.
6.1 - For parents, how can you better integrate talking about God into your everyday routines? (If you don't have kids, how can you influence the next generation in your church or family?)
